item.title: Apartments
item.description: tl;dr section XY intoduction Finding an apartmant can be quite a long run. It can be tough to find the balance between where the apartment is and how the apartment is. There are many factors that come into play, but for our purpose, they can be devided into There are many factors that come into play and finding the optimal balance between them is an overwhelming task, if not done systematically.

item.title: Oscar Speech
item.description: Dataset was acquired from kaggle - contains oscar speeches form 1939 to 2016 what is the dataset about head(speeches) ## # A tibble: 6 x 7 ## Year Category `Film Title` Winner Presenter `Date & Venue` Speech ## <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> ## 1 1939 ~ Actress Gone with t~ Vivie~ Spencer ~ February 29, ~ "VIVIEN L~ ## 2 1939 ~ Actress ~ Gone with t~ Hatti~ Fay Bain~ February 29, ~ "HATTIE M~ ## 3 1941 ~ Actor in~ How Green W~ Donal~ James St~ February 26, ~ "DONALD C~ ## 4 1941 ~ Actress Suspicion Joan ~ Ginger R~ February 26, ~ "JOAN FON~ ## 5 1941 ~ Actress ~ The Great L~ Mary ~ Ginger R~ February 26, ~ "MARY AST~ ## 6 1941 ~ Directing How Green W~ John ~ Cecil B.

item.title: test_1
item.description: library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------------------ tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## <U+221A> ggplot2 3.0.0 <U+221A> purrr 0.2.5 ## <U+221A> tibble 1.4.2 <U+221A> dplyr 0.7.6 ## <U+221A> tidyr 0.8.1 <U+221A> stringr 1.3.1 ## <U+221A> readr 1.1.1 <U+221A> forcats 0.3.0 ## -- Conflicts --------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() Noice
